text:
From 1st April 2021 Clinically Extremely Vulnerable people no long have to shield.
You are advised to take extra precautions and must continue to follow the current Covid-19 guidelines.
To find out further information visit: https://t.co/QHr8GhLi3I
#covid19 #shielding #vaccine https://t.co/OEzvD9r0k3
